p: The standard solutions were prepared in accordance with a procedure described earlier [ 10]. Samples (15.0 mg) of individual substances (terpinene <gamma->, linalool, 1,8-cineole, menthone, limonene, Sigma-Aldrich) were weighed to measuring flasks with ground glass of 10 ml capacity and made up to volume with methanol (HPLC grade) to give the concentration of the respective components at a level of 1.5 mg/ml.
